name: Roll of The Death
description:
Instructions:

Collect enough HEART in a limited time.

Shoot the "Life Dice" can re-roll the result.

Controls:

WASD & Arrow Key: Player Movement

Space: Shoot to re-roll 

Life can only take two in the game.

Credits:

Wendy （Solo developer）

(Resource)
